*/ /**
  The linearGradient() function helps you to create a linear gradient color background
 */function tripleLinearGradient(color,colorState,colorStateSecondary,angle){if(angle===undefined){angle=310;}return"linear-gradient(".concat(angle,"deg, ").concat(color,", ").concat(colorState,", ").concat(colorStateSecondary,")");}export default tripleLinearGradient;
